[warm] So when you said you've been skipping meals to make sure your daughter eats, I just— [pause] Let me pull up your information again. [focused] Because based on what you're telling me, um, you definitely qualify for way more than you think. [excited] Oh my God, wait, you've never applied for WIC? [speeding up] And the childcare assistance program—you could get up to eighty percent covered! That's like, what, six hundred dollars back in your pocket every month?

[empathetically] I see this look on your face, and I get it. [gently] Nobody ever explained this stuff to you, right? [passionate] But listen, these aren't handouts—you've been paying into these systems. [determined] Your daughter qualifies for the free breakfast and lunch program, plus there's actually this emergency fund for, uh, medical expenses that nobody knows about. [very sincerely] When you said you haven't been to the dentist in three years because— [voice breaking] sorry, it just gets me sometimes.

[clearing throat] Look, I'm going to stay late tonight, [confidently] and we're going to fill out every single application together. [hopeful] By next month, you're going to have health coverage, food assistance, childcare help— [emotional] you're going to be able to breathe again. [smiling speaking] Your whole life is about to change, I promise you that.
